body:
Select  *
From    IT15_IconLib IL
Where   IL.IconLibID In (Select Distinct S.IconLibID From   IT15_Screens S Where S.IconLibID Is Not Null)

Update IL Set IL.Aktif = 1
From    IT15_IconLib IL
Where   IL.IconLibID In (Select Distinct S.IconLibID From   IT15_Screens S Where S.IconLibID Is Not Null)

Select  *
From    IT15_IconLib IL
Where   IL.IconLibID In (Select Distinct S.IconLibID From   IT15_Screens S Where S.IconLibID Is Not Null)
